LanguageData.Apparel_RimwaveYellowCoat.label: Yellow army uniform
LanguageData.Apparel_RimwaveYellowCoat.description: The Yellow Army uniform consists of a trench coat, boots, helmet, gloves, and a gas mask with a hose connected to a tank on the lower back.The coat is zipped down to the belt and has Yellow patches on the soldiers and wrists along with a Yellow trim around the bottom near the feet.
